task.title: Remove Initial & Trailing Spaces
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to remove initial and trailing spaces from all segments of a TMX file.

context.p: Leading or trailing spaces may affect the match quality rating of matches retrieved from a translation memory system.

step.cmd: Open the TMX file that you want to modify.
In main menu, select Tasks Remove Initial/Trailing Spaces .

taskbody.result: A progress dialog is displayed while spaces are removed. The editing window is refreshed to reflect the changes.
